bibl.title: Canticle of the Three Young Men. Ode 8 (Dan. 3) 61-66, 71-72, 69-70, 73-84.
bibl.note: Kept among W.E. Crum's papers at the Griffith Institute, Sackler Library, University of Oxford. Provenance unknown, VI/VIIp. - Pp. 10-12: Appendix: Ode 8 in papyrological sources [Greek and Coptic].

bibl.title: Charisterion per Revel A. Coles. Trenta testi letterari e documentari dall’Egitto (P.Coles)

bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Coll. privées: P. Crum Inv. XXIII.1 = P. Coles 1
Juan Chapa, Canticle of the Three Young Men. Ode 8 (Dan. 3) 61-66, 71-72, 69-70, 73-84.

Guido Bastianini, Nikolaos Gonis & Simona Russo (edd.), Charisterion per Revel A. Coles. Trenta testi letterari e documentari dall'Egitto (P.Coles) = Edizioni dell'Istituto Papirologico ""G. Vitelli"". 4 (Firenze, 2015) pp. 3-12 et pl. I.
Kept among W.E. Crum's papers at the Griffith Institute, Sackler Library, University of Oxford. Provenance unknown, VI/VIIp. - Pp. 10-12: Appendix: Ode 8 in papyrological sources [Greek and Coptic].
